alert.note: Alert for Dickinson; Geary; Morris (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dust Advisory issued June 21 at 7:45PM CDT until June 21 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Dickinson County in central Kansas... Southwestern Geary County in east central Kansas... Northwestern Morris County in east central Kansas... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 743 PM CDT, a dust channel was near Abilene, moving east at 30 mph as a result of an outflow boundary from a cluster of severe thunderstorms. HAZARD...Less than two miles visibility with strong winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Trained spotters. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 270 and 298. Locations impacted include... Junction City, Abilene, Herington, Chapman, Enterprise, Hope, Woodbine, Manchester, Latimer, Moonlight and Talmage. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
